DONATION_PHASE_NOT_FOUND: Donation does not exist in the campaign phase.
DONATION_CAMPAIGN_NOT_FOUND: Donation and phase do not exist in the campaign.
DONATED_MESSAGE: Amount donated to the campaign successfully.
CAMPAIGN_MESSAGE_SENT: Message sent to the campaign successfully.
NOT_PARTICIPATED_CAMPAIGN: You are not participating in this campaign.
CAMPAIGN_IMPACT_ERROR: An error occurred while adding the campaign impact video.
PARTICIPATION_INVALID_CAMPAIGN: Invalid campaign: Campaign does not correspond to the participation.
EXISTING_VOLUNTEERS_MESSAGE: You are already a volunteer in this campaign.
PARTICIPATED_CAMPAIGN: Successfully participated as a volunteer in the campaign.
NOT_AUTHORIZE_CAMPAIGN: You are not authorized to access this campaign.
UNAUTHORIZED_ISSUE: Unauthorized: You are not authorized to delete this issue.
ISSUE_MESSAGE_SENT: Message sent to the issue successfully.
ISSUE_ALREADY_VIEWED: Issue already viewed by the user.
SEARCH_INVALID_KEY: Invalid search key: Search key is required.
SKILL_NOT_ADDED: You have not added this skill.
SKILL_ALREADY_SAVED: You already have this skill saved.
SKILL_ID_OR_NAME_REQUIRED: One of the data fields should contain either a skill name or a skill ID.
UNAUTHORIZED_TO_VERIFY_SKILL: Unauthorized: You do not have the required admin privileges to perform this action.
PROFILE_ROLE_CHANGE: Your profile role has been successfully changed to admin.
VIDEO_DELETED: The video has been deleted successfully.
COMMENT_TO_VIDEO: Comment added to the video successfully.
VIDEO_WATCH_COUNT: Video watch count has been updated.
USER_NOT_FOUND_IN_TOKEN: User not found with this token.
ADVOCATE_VALID_MONGO_ID: Advocate ID must be a valid MongoDB ID
TITLE_MUST_NON_EMPTY: Title must be non empty String
ADVOCATE_ISSUE_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: Issue is required if campaign and advocate user are not provided
ADVOCATE_CAMPAIGN_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: Campaign is required if issue and advocateuser are not provided
ADVOCATE_USER_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: AdvocateUser is required if issue and campaign are not provided
ADVOCATE_AT_LEAST_ONE_REQUIRED: At least one of issue, campaign, or user must be provided
FIELD_MUST_BE_OBJECT: must be an object and required
FIELD_NAME_MUST_BE_NON_EMPTY_STRING: name  must be a non-empty string
DONATION_AMOUNT_MUST_BE_NON_NEGATIVE: Donation amount must be a non-negative number
DONATION_DESCRIPTION_MUST_BE_STRING: Donation description must be a string
KARMA_UNIT_MUST_BE_NON_NEGATIVE: karmaUnit must be a non-negative number
DONATION_KARMA_POINT_MUST_BE_NON_NEGATIV: Donation KarmaPoint must be a non-negative number
SIGNATURES_MUST_BE_NON_NEGATIVE: Number of Signatures to petitions must be a non-negative number
NEEDED_SIGNATURES_DESCRIPTION_MUST_BE_ST: Description about Need of Signature must be a string
SIGNATURES_KARMA_POINT_MUST_BE_NON_NEGAT: KarmaPoint earn by every Signature must be a non-negative number
PARTICIPANTS_MUST_BE_POSITIVE: The number of participants must be a positive number
START_DATE_MUST_BE_STRING: The start date must be a valid string
NUMBER_OF_DAYS_MUST_BE_NON_NEGATIVE: Participant Number of Days must be a non-negative number
ROLE_TITLE_MUST_BE_NON_EMPTY_STRING: The role title must be a non-empty string
ADDRESS_MUST_BE_STRING: The Address must be a valid string
LOCATION_MUST_BE_OBJECT: Location must be an object and is required
LOCATION_COORDINATES_MUST_BE_ARRAY: Location coordinates must be an array of two numbers
SKILLS_NON_EMPTY_ARRAY: Skills should be non empty array
PART_TIME_MUST_BE_OBJECT: Participation partTime must be an object and required
FULL_TIME_MUST_BE_OBJECT: Participation fullTime must be an object and required
ON_SITE_MUST_BE_OBJECT: Participation onSite must be an object and required
REMOTE_MUST_BE_OBJECT: Participation Remote must be an object and required
REQUIREMENTS_FIELD_MUST_BE_NON_EMPTY_ARR: Requirements fields must be non empty array
REQUIREMENTS_FIELD_NAME_MUST_BE_NON_EMPT: Requirements fields name must be not empty String
PROVIDES_FIELD_MUST_BE_NON_EMPTY_ARRAY: Provides fields must be non empty array
PROVIDES_FIELD_NAME_MUST_BE_NON_EMPTY_ST: Provides fields name must be not empty String
PART_TIME_FIELD_STATUS_MUST_BE_BOOLEAN: PartTime Status must be boolean object
PART_TIME_FIELD_MUST_BE_OBJECT: PartTime field must be an object
PART_TIME_FIELD_DETAILS_MUST_BE_STRING: PartTime field details must be an non empty string.
FULL_TIME_FIELD_STATUS_MUST_BE_BOOLEAN: Full Time Status must be boolean object
FULL_TIME_FIELD_MUST_BE_OBJECT: Full time field must be an object
FULL_TIME_FIELD_DETAILS_MUST_BE_STRING: Full time field details must be an non empty string.
ON_SITE_FIELD_STATUS_MUST_BE_BOOLEAN: On Site  Status must be boolean object
ON_SITE_FIELD_MUST_BE_OBJECT: On Site field must be an object
ON_SITE_FIELD_DETAILS_MUST_BE_STRING: On Site field details must be an non empty string.
REMOTE_FIELD_STATUS_MUST_BE_BOOLEAN: Remote field  Status must be boolean object
REMOTE_FIELD_MUST_BE_OBJECT: Remote field  must be an object
REMOTE_FIELD_DETAILS_MUST_BE_STRING: Remote  field details must be an non empty string.
CAMPAIGN_ID_MUST_BE_VALID: Campaign ID must be a valid MongoDB ID
VOLUNTEERING_ID_MUST_BE_VALID: volunteeringId ID must be a valid MongoDB ID
DONATION_ID_MUST_BE_VALID: Donation ID must be a valid MongoDB ID
VIDEO_URL_MUST_BE_STRING: Video url must be a string
VIDEO_THUMBNAIL_URL_MUST_BE_STRING: Video thumbnail url must be string
REPORT_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: Either issue, campaign, or profile must be provided
REPORT_AT_LEAST_ONE_REQUIRED: At least one of issue, profile, campaign must be provided
REPORT_SUBJECT_MUST_BE_STRING: Report subject must be a string
PASSWORD_MUST_BE_8_CHAR: Password must be at least 8 characters long
PASSWORD_LETTER_NUMBER_COMBINATION: Password must contain both letters and numbers
CODE_CHAR_VALIDATION: Code must be at least 6 characters long
BOOKMARKS_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: Either issue, campaign, must be provided
BOOKMARKS_AT_LEAST_ONE_REQUIRED: At least one of issue, or campaign must be provided
UNAUTH_CAMPAIGN_UPDATE: You are not authorized to post update in this campaign
